full_summary:
Government Tender Announcement: Repair of M-55 South Podium Deck Membrane and Interlock
=====================================================

### Tendernumber and Reference

*   Solicitation Number: 23-58058
*   Reference Number: cb-7058-9719608
*   Amendment Number: 2

### Tender Description

The National Research Council Canada is seeking a contractor to perform the repair of the M-55 South Podium Deck Membrane and Interlock.

### Tender Requirements

The proposed scope of work includes remedial podium work to an area adjacent to Door #4 at Building M-55 located at the Montreal Road Campus of the National Research Council of Canada.

### Tender Closing Date

The tender closing date is 2023-08-02 at 14:00.

### Mandatory Site Visit

A mandatory site visit has been scheduled for July 18th and July 19th, 2023 at 10:00am. Bidders are required to attend the site visit to receive an Attendance Form which must be signed by the bidder's representative.

### Security Requirements

The contractor must, at all times during the performance of the contract, hold a valid Designated Organization Screening (DOS), issued by the Canadian Industrial Security Director (CISD), Public Works Government Services Canada.  The contractor personnel requiring access to sensitive work sites must EACH hold a valid RELIABILITY STATUS, granted or approved by CISD/PWGSC.

### Additional Requirements

*   The contractor is required to provide a valid WSIB certificate with their Tender or prior to contract award.
*   The parties agree to make every reasonable effort in good faith to settle amicably all disputes or claims relating to or arising from the Contract, through negotiations between the Parties' representatives authorized to settle. 
*   The Office of the Procurement Ombudsman (OPO) was established by the Government of Canada to provide an independent venue for Canadian bidders to raise complaints regarding the award of federal contracts under $25,300 for goods and under $101,100 for services.
